data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhu, Qi-Di, Shi, Fu-Ming (2017): One new species and one new recorded species of the genus Kuzicus (Tettigoniidae: Meconematinae: Meconematini) from China. Zootaxa 4268 (3): 433-438, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4268.3.8|4 occurrences
